item.title: Markdown使用笔记
item.description: Essay one How to write markdow with vim Learn five markdown syntax. Install vim-markdown plugin. Prepare one github repository for saving your markdown notebook. Write first markdown notebook, and push to github. Five markdowm grammar Header Use 1-6 hash characters at the start of the line, corresponding to header levels 1-6 . For Example: 1 2 3 # Header1 ## Header2 ###### Header6 Blockquotes Can only put > before the
